channel.title: Huge Storage mod and conveyors
channel.description:
If i try to use any MK version of conveyors to connect to the bottom input port of a huge storage unit, the game crashes as i place the second conveyor.
I have testes the stock conveyors, plus the modded conveyors up to MK6, all cause the crash. I can also use any MK version of conveyor to connect to standard large storage just fine.
Suggestions on what to do next to troubleshoot?
